CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 20, 1954, pg. 10, reads: "''Gluck... The Hero' - Gluck, who is the leading figure in the fascinating tale 'The King of the Golden River,' will be played by John Kozer when the play appears at the IKS Wednesday night, Feb. 24, at 7 o'clock sharp. Under the auspices of the Children's Civic Theatre, Centre Avenue, Unit, admission will be 30 cents. Tickets are available at the IKS box office. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Actor John Kozer in lederhosen costume, playing "Gluck" in play "The King of the Golden Floor," at Irene Kaufmann Settlement House auditorium
